exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
	         source="button_up_png"
	         source.down="button_down_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
	         size="20" 
	         textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.MainMenuSkin" width="606" height="52" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="factory" label="工厂" x="12" width="62" y="0"/>
	<e:Button id="barracks" x="94" width="62" label="兵营" y="0"/>
	<e:Button id="map" width="62" label="地图" y="0" x="172"/>
	<e:Button id="b4" x="249" width="62" label="按钮" y="0"/>
	<e:Button id="b5" width="62" label="按钮" y="0" x="333"/>
	<e:Button id="b6" x="418" width="62" label="按钮" y="0"/>
	<e:Button id="b7" width="62" label="按钮" y="0" x="500"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.OkCancelTipsSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleLabel" size="24" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" text="提示" textAlign="center" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="cancelButton" label="取消" bottom="9" horizontalCenter="109"/>
	<e:Button id="okButton" bottom="7" horizontalCenter="-108" label="确定" x="10" y="10"/>
	<e:Label id="contentLabel" text="我是内容。。。。。。事实上啊的" x="14" y="55" textColor="0x000000" maxWidth="420" size="24"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.OkTipsSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12"  source="border_png"/>
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleLabel" size="24" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" text="提示" textAlign="center" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
	<e:Label id="contentLabel" text="我是内容。。。。。。事实上啊的" x="14" y="55" textColor="0x000000" maxWidth="420" size="24"/>
	<e:Button id="okButton" label="确定" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="81"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RoleInfoSkin" width="374" height="44" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="att1" text="标签" x="14" y="12" size="20"/>
	<e:Label id="att2" y="13" size="20" text="标签" x="67"/>
	<e:Label id="att3" y="13" size="20" text="标签" x="127"/>
	<e:Label id="att4" y="13" size="20" text="标签" x="190"/>
	<e:Label id="att5" y="13" size="20" text="标签" x="249"/>
	<e:Button id="button" label="按钮" x="305" y="6" width="64" height="34"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.LoadingSkin" width="786" height="494" currentState="s1" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*"  >
	<e:Button id="popPanelButton" label="弹出框" left="22" top="11"/>
	<e:Button label="左下" bottom="15" left="22"/>
	<e:Button label="右下" right="14" bottom="10"/>
	<e:Button id="loginButton" label="右上" right="20" top="12"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="标签" horizontalCenter="-6" verticalCenter="-2" size="26"/>
	<e:Image height="96" width="103" horizontalCenter="-0.5" verticalCenter="67" source="avatar_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="startButton" label="进入" horizontalCenter="-1" verticalCenter="-58"/>
	<e:Button id="connectButton" horizontalCenter="-150" label="连接服务器" verticalCenter="-148" x="10" y="10"/>
	<e:Button id="sendButton" horizontalCenter="130" y="20" verticalCenter="-151" label="发送消息" x="20"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.LoginViewSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" alpha="1"/>
	<e:Group id="groupBottom" height="70" bottom="0" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Button id="backButton" y="8" width="65" label="返回" height="50" right="11"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="initButton" label="init" x="141" y="248"/>
	<e:Button id="loginButton" label="login" x="308" y="252"/>
	<e:Button id="payButton" label="pay" x="484" y="250"/>
	<e:Label x="95" y="59" size="24"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.MainIntervViewSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" alpha="1"/>
	<e:Group height="59" left="0" top="0" right="0">
		<e:Image id="iconLabel" height="52" width="56" source="avatar_jpg" x="3" y="3"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="标签" size="22" x="76" y="2"/>
		<e:Label id="generationLabel" text="标签" size="22" x="76" y="31"/>
		<e:Label id="goldLabel" text="标签" x="200" y="4" size="22"/>
		<e:Label id="diamondLabel" text="标签" x="382" y="15" size="20"/>
		<e:Button id="buyDiamondButton" label="Buy" x="319" y="4" width="60" height="44"/>
		<e:Button id="testButton" label="测试界面" right="10" verticalCenter="4.5"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group height="491" width="960" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Group id="groupLeft" height="426" width="407" x="24" y="23">
			<e:Button label="按钮" x="28" y="16"/>
			<e:Button label="按钮" x="201" y="15"/>
			<e:ProgressBar id="progressLeft" x="47" y="71" width="240" height="15"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="groupRight" width="407" y="28" height="426" x="502">
			<e:Button y="13" label="按钮" x="131"/>
			<e:Button y="11" label="按钮" x="264"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="groupBottom" height="70" bottom="0" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Button id="menuButton" label=">" x="18" y="11" width="65" height="50"/>
		<e:Button id="backButton" y="8" width="65" label="返回" height="50" right="11"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
